meanings.sent1: I had to reinstalled the app on my phone after it stopped working.
meanings.sent2: He reinstalled the operating system on his computer to fix the issue.
meanings.sent3: The computer technician reinstalled the software with a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: She reinstalled the program like a skilled surgeon performing a delicate operation.
meanings.sent5: The process of reinstalling the software was as simple as pressing a button.

meanings.definition: Place (someone) in a position or office again.
meanings.sent1: The company reinstalled him as the manager after his brief absence.
meanings.sent2: They reinstalled her as the team leader due to her excellent performance.
meanings.sent3: The boss reinstalled the employee in his position with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: He was reinstalled as the captain of the team, leading them to victory.
meanings.sent5: Being reinstalled in his role brought a sense of familiarity and comfort to him.
